info.title: PAY. Global Management System API's
info.description: A restful journey to your payments.

post.description: Use your username and password from my.pay.nl to exchange your credentials for a bearer token. You will receive an access token and refresh token. Use the access token to make API calls and use the refresh token to refresh both of the tokens (See Authenticate:Refresh). The access token is valid for 1 hour, the refresh token is valid for 2 hours

post.description: Creates a new authentication token under a merchant. You can also specify which authorisation groups needs to be linked to the token. You can also supply a merchantCode. If a merchantCode is supplied then you need to have access to that merchant. You need to authenticate with an AT-code as username and a token as password

merchantCode.description: The merchant id of your company starting with M.

authorisation.description:
Specify which kind of authorisation is applicable for the token.

all: all merchant rights
specified: specify which authorisation groups should be enabled from the token. At least one authorisation group (in the authorisationGroups array) is mandatory

get.description: A Pay. clearing contains multiple clearing lines. This API returns all clearing lines for a specified period. If you are a partner and you have rights to your merchants you can retrieve the clearing lines also for your merchants

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the returned records. If not supplied we will default to 100 records

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Indicate which page you want in your result set. If not supplied we will default to page 1

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Indicate in which period the transactions are done

eq.description: Get results that equal the given value

gt.description: Get results that are greater than the given value

gte.description: Get results that are greater than or equal to the given value

lt.description: Get results that are less than the given value

lte.description: Get results that are less than or equal to the given value

parameters.name: processedDate
parameters.description: Indicate for which period you want to retrieve the clearing lines

eq.description: Get results that equal the given value

gt.description: Get results that are greater than the given value

gte.description: Get results that are greater than or equal to the given value

lt.description: Get results that are less than the given value

lte.description: Get results that are less than or equal to the given value

parameters.name: merchant
parameters.description: If you are a partner you can indicate for which merchants you want to retrieve the clearing lines. If you do not supply a merchant we will return the clearing lines for all your merchants

eq.description: Get results that equal the given value

neq.description: Get results that do not equal the given value

parameters.name: clearingLineType
parameters.description: You can indicate which lineType you want to retrieve. See for more information the BillingLineTypes API (https://developer.pay.nl/reference/get_billinglinetypes)

eq.description: Get results that equal the given value

parameters.name: turnoverGroup
parameters.description: You can indicate for which turnover group you want to retrieve the clearing lines. If not supplied we will return the clearing lines for all turnover groups

eq.description: Get results that equal the given value

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: A clearing line has a state. By providing a state you will only retrieve clearing lines in that state

eq.description: Get results that equal the given value

parameters.name: clearingID
parameters.description: A clearing line is available on a clearing. By providing a clearing ID you will only retrieve clearing lines for that clearing

eq.description: Get results that equal the given value

code.description: The merchant id of your company starting with M.

get.description: A Pay. invoice contains multiple invoice lines. This API returns all invoice lines for a specified period. If you are a partner and you have rights to your merchants you can retrieve the invoice lines also for your merchants

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the returned records. If not supplied we will default to 100 records

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Indicate which page you want in your result set. If not supplied we will default to page 1

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Indicate in which period when the transactions are done

eq.description: Get results that equal the given value

gt.description: Get results that are greater than the given value

gte.description: Get results that are greater than or equal to the given value

lt.description: Get results that are less than the given value

lte.description: Get results that are less than or equal to the given value

parameters.name: processedDate
parameters.description: Indicate for which period you want to retrieve the invoice lines

eq.description: Get results that equal the given value

gt.description: Get results that are greater than the given value

gte.description: Get results that are greater than or equal to the given value

lt.description: Get results that are less than the given value

lte.description: Get results that are less than or equal to the given value

parameters.name: merchant
parameters.description: If you are a partner you can indicate for which merchants you want to retrieve the invoice lines. If you do not supply a merchant we will return the invoice lines for all your merchants

eq.description: Get results that equal the given value

neq.description: Get results that do not equal the given value

parameters.name: billingLineType
parameters.description: You can indicate which lineType you want to retrieve. See for more information the BillingLineTypes API (https://developer.pay.nl/reference/get_billinglinetypes)

eq.description: Get results that equal the given value

parameters.name: turnoverGroup
parameters.description: You can indicate for which turnover group you want to retrieve the invoice lines. If not supplied we will return the invoice lines for all turnover groups

eq.description: Get results that equal the given value

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: A invoice line has a state. By providing a state you will only retrieve invoice lines in that state

eq.description: Get results that equal the given value

parameters.name: invoiceID
parameters.description: A invoice line is available on a invoice. By providing a invoice ID you will only retrieve invoice lines for that invoice

parameters.description: The type of invoice line. Can either be SELL or BUY.

authorizedToSign.description:
Indicate if the person is authorized to sign on behalf of the company:
no: not authorized to sign
alone: is authorized to sign
shared: is authorized to sign together with other(s)

pep.description: Indicate if the person is a Politically Exposed Person (PEP).

pepDescription.description: Describe in your own words why this person is a PEP.
pepDescription.example: The person is active as an alderman in the municipality where he lives.

ubo.description:
Indicate if the person is an UBO:
no: no ubo
pseudo: is a pseudo ubo (no financial interest)
direct: is a direct ubo with financial interest
indirect: is a indirect ubo (due to involvement of a parent company or holding) with financial interest

uboPercentage.description: Indicate for direct and indirect UBO's the percentage of involvement (e.g. % of shares of a company).

1: Amount is fixed. URL and variables can be changed
2: Pre filled variable can be changed. Amount is fixed
3: URL, amount and variables are fixed. Only empty variables can be filled

patch.description: Transactions that have the status pending (which implies that the payment is waiting for an action) can be cancelled. If you cancel a transaction a new processing action cannot be started. A cancel of the transaction will not stop the money flow. The payment state of the transaction will be set to CANCEL (-90). You can use the EX code or the order ID to cancel the transaction
